dc:title: Youth Group Plans to Disseminate Catholic Worker
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A letter explaining the C.W. involvement in promoting the interracial cause. Speakers, pamphlets and schools are encouraged to promote the civil rights movement.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 55 1934-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
